scripts.test: npm run clean && cucumber-js test && npm run report
scripts.test:chromium: npm run clean && BROWSER=chromium cucumber-js test --parallel 3 && npm run report
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean && BROWSER=firefox cucumber-js test --parallel 3 && npm run report
scripts.test:webkit: npm run clean && BROWSER=webkit cucumber-js test --parallel 3 && npm run report
scripts.test:all-browsers: npm run test:chromium && npm run test:firefox && npm run test:webkit
